components/cart/coupon-codes:
{{! Coupons Value }} {{#each cart.coupons}}
{{code}} {{lang 'cart.coupon_codes.remove'}}
{{/each}}
components/cart/gift-certificates:
{{! Gift Certificates }} {{#each cart.gift_certificates}}
{{code}} {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.remaining' value=remaining.formatted}} {{lang 'cart.gift_certificates.remove'}}
{{/each}}
components/cart/shipping-calculator:
{{> components/common/page-title title=(lang 'cart.shipping_calculator.title')}} {{!-- Select Destination Form --}}
{{> core/forms/common/text label=(lang 'cart.shipping_calculator.zip_postal_code') name="shipping-zip" id="shipping-zip" }}
{{!-- Alert placeholder --}}
